message:
Jabir Ibn Samurah (RA) said, "I saw the Messenger of ALLAH (sall ALLAHU 'alaihi wa sallam) on one night of the full moon. I looked at him. He was dressed in a reddish garment. I compared him with the moon and found that, - for - he was better than the moon." (Mishkat Al-Masabih 2: 518)

The Prophet is closer to the believers than their own selves.." [Qur'an 33:6]
